title: China clay. Parts 1 & 2
creator_credit: Ronald Haines and British Foundation Pictures
brief_description: Part one shows the Cornish china clay pits and the process that separates it from impurities and prepares it for shipment to the pottery mills. Part two shows how the raw clay becomes plates and figurines. Also how decorations are added. Shows enormous handmade Royal Doulton vase.
